channel.title: Please somebody help me! =)
channel.description: Hey guys, do you NEED a router to make a server? Because i've been trying to make a server.. following EVERYTHING as its said in Mod T.. whatever his name is tut.. can somebody help me.. in english :P

item.title: Please somebody help me! =)
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

Ancient Fire:

Hey guys, do you NEED a router to make a server? Because i’ve been trying to make a server… following EVERYTHING as its said in Mod T… whatever his name is tut… can somebody help me… in english

well yes, if you have a router you probably have wireless which means an ok internet rate (mb/s)

if you just have the cable into the phone line then you wont be able to get many people onto a server, unless your on high speed through cable.

but no, u dont need a router.

Read full topic

item.title: Please somebody help me! =)

item.description:
@bumbumlongtime wrote:

ok, no you dont need a router to make a server
